ComicInfo.Title: I Guess; Bombs Away; Singers; Brown Alice; Petra; Animus; Oh, But You Don't Know Him... He's Really Sweet...;
ComicInfo.Summary:
Maggie plays nursemaid to her adopted “children” and there’s a new queen in Lumina’s village. Then, in flashbacks, we follow Fritz’s sister Petra from her youth to her days as a bodybuilder. 40 years in, Love and Rockets has enjoyed a resurgence of popularity with a wave of national publicity in 2022 for the Hernandez brothers, culminating in the acclaimed new PBS documentary, Love and Rockets: The Great American Comic Book, now streaming!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Jaime Hernandez | 1 | Var | Fantagraphics exclusive variant | Gilbert Hernandez | 2 |
